com.io7m.jspatial.quadtrees

Interface QuadTreeBuilderType<T extends QuadTreeMemberType<T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The precise type of members.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    QuadTreeBuilder

    public interface QuadTreeBuilderType<T extends QuadTreeMemberType<T>>
    A mutable builder for instantiating quadtree implementations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • build

        QuadTreeType<T> build()
        Returns:
        A new quadtree based on the parameters given so far.

      • buildWithSD

        QuadTreeSDType<T> buildWithSD()
        Returns:
        A new SD quadtree based on the parameters given so far.

      • disableLimitedQuadrantSizes

        void disableLimitedQuadrantSizes()
        Do not use specific minimum quadrant sizes.

      • disablePruning

        void disablePruning()
        Disable pruning of empty quadtree nodes.

      • enableLimitedQuadrantSizes

        void enableLimitedQuadrantSizes(int x,
                                int y)
                         throws IllegalArgumentException
        Use specific minimum quadrant sizes.
        Parameters:
        x - The minimum quadrant width - Must be even and greater than or equal to 2.
        y - The minimum quadrant height - Must be even and greater than or equal to 2.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the preconditions above are not satisfied.

      • enablePruning

        void enablePruning()
        Enable pruning of empty quadtree nodes.

      • setPosition2i

        void setPosition2i(int x,
                   int y)
        Set the position of the quadtree.
        Parameters:
        x - The X coordinate.
        y - The Y coordinate.

      • setSize2i

        void setSize2i(int x,
               int y)
        throws IllegalArgumentException

        Set the size of the quadtree.

        Parameters:
        x - The width - Must be even and greater than or equal to 2.
        y - The height - Must be even and greater than or equal to 2.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the preconditions above are not satisfied.
